identity.name: EcoGuard Pro
identity.description: A fusion of Swiss Authority (precision, grids) and Organic Earthy (environmental context). It feels like a high-end digital clipboard for field engineers.
principles: Clarity: Data is the hero, decoration is the enemy
Safety: High contrast for alerts, calm for workflows

layout.surface_style: Grid Borders - 1px visible borders, minimal shadows, technical feel

buttons.primary: bg-primary text-primary-foreground hover:bg-primary/90 shadow-sm font-medium rounded-md px-6 py-2.5 transition-all active:scale-95
buttons.secondary: bg-secondary text-secondary-foreground hover:bg-secondary/80 font-medium rounded-md px-6 py-2.5
buttons.outline: border-2 border-primary/20 hover:border-primary text-primary bg-transparent font-medium rounded-md px-6 py-2.5

cards.dashboard: bg-card border border-border/60 shadow-sm p-6 relative overflow-hidden group hover:border-primary/30 transition-colors
cards.metric: bg-card border border-border p-4 flex flex-col justify-between h-full

inputs.default: bg-background border-input focus:ring-2 focus:ring-primary/20 focus:border-primary transition-all rounded-md

status_badges.base: inline-flex items-center px-2.5 py-0.5 rounded-full text-xs font-medium border

visual_enhancers.textures: Subtle noise overlay on dashboard backgrounds

critical_rules: DO NOT use gradients for text.
DO NOT use rounded-xl or rounded-2xl. Keep it sharp (rounded-sm or rounded-md).
Mobile-first: The inspection flow must work perfectly on a 375px width screen.

instructions_to_main_agent: You are building a professional Environmental Self-Inspection System. The vibe is 'Technical Field Guide'. Use the provided colors and fonts. For the 'Interactive Map', create a component that takes an image URL (the floor plan) and allows placing absolute-positioned 'Pin' components on top of it. Use the 'Bento Grid' layout for the dashboard. Ensure all inputs and buttons are large enough for touch targets (min 44px) for the mobile inspection flow.
